software.about:
TeamSpeak 3
Crystal Clear Cross-Platform
Voice Communication
Key Features

    Unmatched Voice Quality and Low Latency
    Voice Data Encryption
    Public-Private Key Authentication
    Multi-Server Connectivity
    Customizable Server & Client
    Mobile-device support for Android and iOS
software.custom_start_script:
#!/bin/sh
mkdir -p  /engines/var/run/flags/
PID_FILE=/home/app/logs/ts3server.pid

export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=".:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"

/home/app/ts3server &
pid=$!
echo $pid > /home/app/logs/ts3server.pid
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
wait $pid
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

template_files.title: ts3db_mysql.ini
template_files.content:
[config]
host=_Engines_Environment(dbhost)
port=3306
username=_Engines_Environment(dbuser)
password=_Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)
database=_Engines_Environment(dbname)
socket=

The Token is used one time only to set up the serveradmin
